content.a: We're in this together. Explore Azure resources and tools to help you navigate COVID-19

content.p: INVENT WITH PURPOSE
See Azure announcements from the event, including new technologies to innovate across all your environments.

h2.a: Accelerate innovation anywhere with Azure Arc

content.p: Secure, develop, and operate infrastructure, apps, and data anywhere—on-premises, multicloud, or the edge.

h2.a: Innovate with cloud native and open source

content.p: Build and deploy cloud-native apps and take advantage of flexible choices to create microservice applications.

h2.a: Get more value from all your data

content.p: Transform your business with limitless database scale and performance, unmatched analytics, and unified governance.

content.h2: Find out how these customers are innovating with Azure

content.p: To bring fans deeper into the game, NBA CourtOptix uses Azure machine learning and AI solutions to provide on-screen analysis of every shot, pass, and play.

img.alt: Person dunking an Oreo cookie into a glass of milk.

content.p: Mondelēz International dramatically improved app performance, availability, and resilience by migrating its business-critical SAP resources to Azure.

img.alt: Worker loading cans of Pepsi into a refrigerator.

content.p: PepsiCo uses Azure Machine Learning to identify consumer shopping trends and provide actionable, store-level insights.

img.alt: Cancer researcher in scrubs and a mask looking through a microscope.

content.p: American Cancer Society has kept resources flowing to patients and researchers during the global pandemic by transitioning their infrastructure to Azure.

img.alt: Person in a factory using a tablet to check the performance data of a robotic manufacturing arm.

content.p: Bosch Building Technologies used Azure to expand and globally deploy a platform that analyzes energy consumption and helps pursue ongoing energy efficiency.

img.alt: The patio of a modern office building, overlooking a city by a lake.

content.p: Swiss Re accelerates Java app modernization—quickly, compliantly, and with minimal overhead—using Azure Spring Cloud.

p.a: Explore expanded programs, tools, and guidance to accelerate your cloud migration and modernization.

p.a: Rapidly build and ship low-code cloud apps that run natively on your favorite platforms.
